<title level="1" right="Rules">[Spellguns](/Rules.aspx?ID=1911)</title>

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 96 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The [spellgun](/Traits.aspx?ID=491) trait appears on items that can generate a magical effect that flies out like a bullet. You can make either a spell attack roll with a spellgun or a ranged attack roll using your proficiency with simple firearms. Spellguns have a range increment, which applies regardless of which type of attack roll you make. Though you can use your modifier for simple firearms, a spellgun isn't actually a firearm. You don't get the damage of a firearm Strike, nor other benefits like critical specialization. Similarly, you can't load or reload a spellgun, affix [talismans](/Equipment.aspx?Category=15&Subcategory=19) to one, attach scopes, affix [attached](/Traits.aspx?ID=171) weapons like [bayonets](/Weapons.aspx?ID=186) or [reinforced stocks](/Weapons.aspx?ID=187), and so on.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
